items.title: IWPP5 — International Workshop on Public Policy
items.description: Presenting the paper “Selective Transparency at Scale: Topic Modeling, Sentiment Analysis, and Multinomial Evidence on FOI Responsiveness” in Track T09W02 — Machine Learning, NLP and LLMs for Policy Issues.

items.title: GCTR 2026 — Global Conference on Transparency Research
items.description: Biennial Global Conference on Transparency Research, bringing together scholars, policymakers, and practitioners to discuss the latest advances in transparency and accountability research worldwide.

items.title: International Research Meeting on FOI
items.description: Two-day international research meeting on Freedom of Information, hosted at ULB Brussels. Gathered 49 participants from more than 10 countries. Funded by the FNRS (Fonds de la Recherche Scientifique).

items.title: GCTR 2024 — Global Conference on Transparency Research
items.description: Co-organised the 2024 edition of the Global Conference on Transparency Research, held in Brussels. Presented findings on FOI implementation and responsiveness from our Belgian field experiment and platform analysis.

items.title: TRANSACT Belgian Field Experiment
items.description: Launch and execution of the TRANSACT field experiment across all 581 Belgian municipalities. FOI requests sent between March 13–15, 2023; data collection officially closed on May 10, 2023.
